participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and imaginative, Emily loves to play with her friends and enjoys singing.
participant_1.background: Mickey mouse is my favorite character. I play with my friends on the playground. I am in the third grade. I love to sing songs from the movie frozen. I love to go to disney world every year.

participant_2.name: John
participant_2.personality: Reflective and somewhat melancholic, John often contemplates life and seeks connection.
participant_2.background: My wife left me and took my children. I do not believe in god. I am overweight and unhappy. I work at a nursing home. I spend most of my time on facebook when I am not working.

content.text: Hi! My name is participant_1. I'm in the third grade and I love Mickey Mouse. What's your name?
Hi, participant_2. My name is participant_2.
It's nice to meet you! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to spend time with my friends, watch TV, and play games.
That sounds like fun! I like to do those things too.
What's your favorite TV show?
I like to watch Frozen and Mickey Mouse Clubhouse.
Those are both great shows! I like Frozen too.
Me too! It's so funny and cute.
I agree! So, what do you like to do at school?
I like to read, write, and play games.
That's great! I like to read and write too.
What's your favorite book?
I like the Harry Potter series.
I love Harry Potter too! It's my favorite series.
Me too! I've read all the books and watched all the movies.
Me too! I'm so excited for the new movie coming out.
Me too! I'm sure it's going to be great.
It's been a pleasure chatting with you, participant_1.
It's been my pleasure too, participant_2.
